dcterms:description: FairytaleQA is a narrative comprehension dataset designed for children in kindergarten to eighth grade, focusing on question answering tasks in fairy tales.
dcterms:title: FairytaleQA

dcterms:description: Counterfactual FairytaleQA is a variant of the FairytaleQA dataset that incorporates counterfactual data augmentation to evaluate model robustness against gender perturbations.
dcterms:title: Counterfactual FairytaleQA
